steps.name: Action Test Step 1 : Set Vendor simulator to Success
Action Test Step 2 : Wait 15 seconds for simulator to run
Action Test Step 3 : Execute CTX SOAP Request
Action Test Step 4 : Wait 15 seconds for data to be committed to DB
Step.1 --> CTX soap response assertions --> Validate purchase amount is correct (same as request)
Step.2 --> CTX soap response assertions --> Validate originId is correct (same as request)
Step.3 --> CTX soap response assertions -->Validate productId is correct (same as request)
Step.4 --> CTX soap response assertions -->Validate channelIndicator is correct (same as request)
Step.5 --> CTX soap response assertions -->Validate responseCode is correct (same as request)
